sources.title: Gulliver's Travels
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Gulliver's Travels
sources.description: Title: Gulliver's Travels Summary: A doctor washes ashore on an island inhabited by little people. Directed by: Dave Fleischer Actors: Jessica Dragonette, Lanny Ross, Pinto Colvig Production Company: Fleischer Studios Release Date: 22 December 1939 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Gulliver washes ashore on Lilliput and attempts to prevent war between that tiny kingdom and its equally minuscule rival, Blefuscu, as well as smooth the way for the romance between the Princess and Prince of the opposing lands. In this he is alternately aided and hampered by the Lilliputian town crier and general fussbudget, Gabby. A life-threatening situation develops when the bumbling trio of Blefuscu spies, Sneak, Snoop, and Snitch, manage to steal Gulliver's pistol.

sources.title: Gulliver's Travels (1939)
sources.description: Gulliver washes ashore on Lilliput and attempts to prevent war between that tiny kingdom and its equally-miniscule rival, Blefiscu, as well as smooth the way for the romance between the Princess and Prince of the opposing lands. In this he is alternately aided and hampered by the Lilliputian town crier and general fussbudget, Gabby. A life-threatening situation develops when the bumbling trio of Blefiscu spies, Sneak, Snoop, and Snitch, manage to steal Gulliver's pistol. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/gullivers-travels-1939/

sources.title: Gulliver's Travels (1939) ORIGINAL MASTERPIECE
sources.description:
Director: Dave Fleischer
Producer: Max Fleischer

In this timeless animated feature, Gulliver is shipwrecked and washed ashore to a kingdom of tiny people. He soon finds himself in the middle of a war over the choice of a wedding song!

sources.title: Gulliver's Travels (1939) Jonathan Swift | Adventure, Comedy | Animated Movie
sources.description:
JONATHAN SWIFT’S IMMORTAL FANTASY COME TO LIFE !
Gulliver washes ashore on Lilliput and attempts to prevent war between a tiny kingdom and its equally-miniscule rival, Blefiscu, as well as smooth the way for the romance between the Princess and Prince of the opposing lands. In this he is alternately aided and hampered by the Lilliputian town crier and general fussbudget, Gabby. A life-threatening situation develops when the bumbling trio of Blefiscu spies, Sneak, Snoop, and Snitch, manage to steal Gulliver’s pistol.

Directors: Dave Fleischer, Willard Bowsky 
Writers: Jonathan Swift, Edmond Seward 
Stars: Jessica Dragonette, Lanny Ross, Pinto Colvig
Genres:  Classic Literature, Animation, Adventure, Musical





@CultCinemaClassics

sources.title: Gulliver's Travels 1939
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: Gulliver's_Travels-1939
sources.description: This is the more complete version of the now PD feature length film cartoon of Gulliver's Travels. Runtime SHOULD be around 76 minutes. Enjoy

metadata.Plot: Gulliver washes ashore on Lilliput and attempts to prevent war between that tiny kingdom and its equally minuscule rival, Blefuscu, as well as smooth the way for the romance between the Princess and Prince of the opposing lands. In this he is alternately aided and hampered by the Lilliputian town crier and general fussbudget, Gabby. A life-threatening situation develops when the bumbling trio of Blefuscu spies, Sneak, Snoop, and Snitch, manage to steal Gulliver's pistol.
